entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • crossgen/ilc --help weird indentation #88304
  • PGO: simple generic method is not inlined #88299
    8.0.0
  • I'm trying out how the `QuicListener` API to see how suitable it is, but so far I've been unable to even get it past the hello world stage. #88298
  • NativeAOT: Silent unwind info corruption #88292

Closed

  • OptionsValidator source-gen shouldn't cover static and const members #88150
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Using stackalloc instead of new byte[x] on Streams #88303
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Move IMeterFactory to System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource #88302
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2213468 #88301
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] fix memfuncs for FreeBSD #88300
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Quote whole commands to make it easier to consume linker args by Xamarin #88294
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Allow duplicate feature switch settings #88293
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix OptionsValidator source-gen to skip static and const members #88254
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0

Updated

  • NativeAOT Watson changes for crashes/unhandled exceptions #88273
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle primitive-sized remainders overlapping padding in physical promotion #88109
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upgrade to LLVM 16 & C++17, and bundle libc++ on Linux #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Pass exact context to getMethodInfo #88025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
